remarks: Swap 2nd and 3rd members of lattice join.  Lemma 2.2 in [MegPav2002] p. 362.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
statement:
latjass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latjass.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latj32 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) .\/ Z ) = ( ( X .\/ Z ) .\/ Y ) ) $.
